title: Software Development II
beurteilung: Grading is based on individual programming assignments (33%), mid-term tests (33%) and the final examination (33%)
literatur:
Core Reading:

  • Winter, M.: Methodische objektorientierte Softwareentwicklung, dpunkt.verlag, 2005.
  • Flanagan D.: Java in a Nutshell. O'Reilly, current edition.
  • Hinz M.; Kappel G.; Kapsammer E.; Retschitzegger W.: UML@Work. dpunkt-Verlag, current edition
  • Gamma E.; Helm R.; Johnson R.; Vlissides J.: Entwurfsmuster -- Elemente wiederverwend-barer objektorientierter Software. Addison-Wesley, current edition

Supplementary reading will be announced each semester.
